name: sanest person of Nallasopara!
wishText: Enjoy your day (Jo already katham ho gaya hai shayad☠)
textInChatBox: Abhi iske baad kya bolna hai mujhe nahi malum.
text2: So let's talk about the best 3 things in Nallasopara!!!
text3: 1) Udhar sablog ko Vimal aur Sting pasand hai🤤
text4: 2) Mc stan sab ka role model hai🗣️
replayText: Abhi tho me dahej bhi deserve karta hu😂!
